特記事項:
この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。

本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: This class will be conducted in English only, and students are expected to use English exclusively while participating. Class will be conducted as part lecture and part pairwork and group discussion and collaborative work. Students will work in pairs and groups and will discuss readings and key questions. They will also share their own research topics through presentations and a final paper. The will give peer feedback on each other’s presentations and writing assignments. Students will be required to complete self-study activities from the textbook and occasionally some other sources that are not covered in class. Research and much of the writing will also be done out of class. Active student interaction and participation is a strong expectation of this course. Currently, the intention is for this class to be taught face-to-face; adaptations may be made in light of changing conditions and university policies. Students are expected to follow safety protocols (i.e. wearing masks and respecting social distancing) during all face-to-face classes.
